str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and histemi; to remove, i.e. instigate to revolt; usually to desist, desert, etc.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
Counsel, deliberate wisdom, decree. From boulomai; volition, i.e. advice, or purpose.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and luo; to loosen down, i.e. to demolish; specially to halt for the night.
